### getStackAddress() {#ade15d10d1bbd9f86b341bcd44a16eb11}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register OutgoingArgHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-cpp/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/powerpc/lib/target/powerpc/gisel/ppccalllowering-cpp">PPCCallLowering.cpp</a>.
